text_block_list.text: Ooshaaaaa! We're going to King Uma's castle! Let's go, Sister Elle, Miss Glass.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But where is the Castle of King Uma? If you don't know, there is no way to proceed. ……
Hmmm, let me give you an infinitely vague clue.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: NO! Please tell me the answer! I'm tired of all the trouble!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I think I could use that one in a situation like this.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume, the Sire's Skill! Pace Up!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Outline! Somehow or other, the group managed to locate the Uma King's castle…

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: March! Reach! And they confronted King Uma who came out of Uma King's castle! The King of the Horse King came out of the Castle of the Horse King and faced the King of the Horse King. Finish!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oooh, the story has picked up pace, Deuce!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! You guys already arrived? I haven't even had time to put on my horse king's cape!
What happened to the Super Golgi Ogre EX I placed along the way!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I didn't see it. Because I omitted it.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Golshi senior, you've had enough fun, haven't you? The fun is over.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Go back to your world. By this thunder!
Oh, this is so bad! Oh, my God, did you just get classed up to "Uma-Angel"?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Soar, O clean judgment! The Thunder of Angels, ！！！！！

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, here it is, the special magic for the King of Uma! And here comes the end roll!
Aaaaah? This ain't working! This kind of electric current won't even relieve stiff shoulders.
What? You withstood it?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……… after all.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Glass! What's the meaning of this? She said you can't beat her with the same spells as in the lore.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I had a hunch somehow. I felt…… uncomfortable with that lore.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: With the lightning that is innate to me, I will give the Demon King destruction and pleasure." What is "innate"? What is "destruction and pleasure"?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: At least the magic power is not "innate" to the Uma girl. The power that could defeat the Uma King is probably not in this spell: ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I don't know, but I'm not sure if…… is right. I guess I was wrong to try to beat her so easily.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Then let's settle this like a fantasy and take the high road of fantasy!
Oh? What's that? A showdown between the monsters you keep? Or is it a cooking showdown with ingredients you picked up?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Speaking of fantasy, let's get to the wrestling! Let's go, King Uma! Elle and I are going to have a 60 minute one-on-one match!
Ah! That's my specialty! That's what I'm good at! When it comes to fantasy, menko is better than wrestling, menko!
Doshhhhhhhh!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh, I've been hit deuce! Mil Masterio's limited edition round menco ah!
I'm so happy to see you! That's the first Umandam menko! Even though it's been discontinued and there's not much left in stock, it's still strong!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Elle! Why are you really playing the men's game?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Because - I wanted to do it, dace! Menko, it sounds like fun. ……
If Menko is no good, let's settle it like Uma Musume and settle it with that.
Speaking of Uma Musume, it's a race! With the power of the horse king, the course is just a short, short, short distance away!
Come on out! Not Tokyo Re―, Makyo Racetrack!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, oh, oh, in a flash, a course that looks exactly like Tokyo Race Track!
Come on, Elle, Glass, come on! If we settle this world in a fair and square way, you won't have any complaints, will you?
I'll show you the horse king Golshi's hell run!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, I hope so! Monk's physical abilities are the strongest of all the jobs! You can't lose!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: …… unavoidable. But Elle, please don't let your guard down.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… ke? Glass, what's wrong with your scary face?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: You said it. Golshi, the King of the Horses, "in her own way, in her own world".

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ―This is the kingdom of swords and magic, "Umanest". This is not the world we are always in.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What is about to begin is a fantasy race of sword fights and spells!
